creditline: Bequest of Margaret McMillan Weber in memory of her mother Katherine Kittridge McMillan
description: Blue damask with large pictorial medallions front and back with floral and fauna embroidery incuding metallic threads. White cuffs with opictorial embroidery. Side opening with black embroidered bands around neckline and bottom edge and side vent. Blue lining. Loop and knot fasteners.
title: Medallion Robe
